name: Infinite Runner Sample - Pixel Game Maker MV
name_original: Infinite Runner Sample - Pixel Game Maker MV
description:
This is a sample project of how to do an infinite runner in Pixel Game Maker MV. I hope you enjoy it and can use it to make an awesome game.

Tutorial is going to be the runtime, to test it.
Export is the actual files if you want to import them to your game or edit the project.
